comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET4.0C)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET4.0C)

In firefox 3.6.13, the open and save dialogs will stop functioning after the browser being open for a few hours. I watch as I click "Save link as" and the dialog opens very briefly and closes immediately. This also occurs when choosing "Save As" from the download dialog or using the Open File Dialog from the FILE menu.

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
There are no specific steps to reproduce. This occurs after the browser has been open for a few hours.
Actual Results:  
Open or Save dialog opens briefly and closes.

Expected Results:  
The user is able to utilize the open and save dialog boxes.
comments.creator: joshua@damagejackyl.com
